property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you summon this creature or one of your other Gods into the battle zone, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ Whenever a card is put into your shields, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {LEFT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Right God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.) ■ While this creature is linked, it breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever a card leaves your shield zone, untap one of your creatures in the battle zone. {RIGHT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Left God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your Oracles in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your other creatures would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, put them into your mana zone tapped instead. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your exile creatures in the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Trio Doron Go: When this creature is destroyed, you may put any number of exile creatures that have a different name that has "Friends" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Robin Michaelan Global, Friends Power" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Kourin—At the end of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, search your deck. You may put a creature that costs 6 or less that has "Shield Go" from among it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ At the start of your opponent's turn, they can only untap one of their creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, shuffle all cards in your hand, graveyard and this creature into your deck. Then draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD GO} (When this creature is destroyed, put it face up into your shield zone. When this creature is face up and would leave your shield zone, put it into your graveyard instead.) ■ When you put this creature face up into your shield zone, skip the rest of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD GO} (When this creature is destroyed, put it face up into your shield zone. When this creature is face up and would leave your shield zone, put it into your graveyard instead.) ■ When you put this creature face up into your shield zone, skip the rest of the turn.

property.name: Rules

The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.)

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have a creature that has Ryusei in its name and a creature that has Prin in its name in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Evolution—Put on one of your non-psychic Dragon creatures. ■ Whenever this creature battles, return the other creature to its owner's hand and untap this creature instead of battling. {TRIPLE BREAKER}
